genericPitch: I build full-stack applications and data-driven solutions backed by real metrics. From Go backends to Power BI dashboards, from leading dev teams to shipping under 24-hour hackathon deadlines — I bring technical depth, fast learning, and a bias toward shipping.

highlights.label: Full-Stack Development
highlights.problem: UBC students needed a reliable grocery delivery platform with secure access control
highlights.built: High-performance backend services with auth + responsive React frontend
highlights.impact: 40% faster server response, 100% API test pass rate, 50+ active users

highlights.label: Data Analytics & Forecasting
highlights.problem: Operational teams lacked visibility into time-series production trends and exceptions
highlights.built: Interactive analytics dashboard with ETS forecasting and rolling-origin backtesting
highlights.tech: Python, Streamlit, statsmodels, Plotly, Power Automate
highlights.impact: 45% lower MAE vs baseline, automated email reporting via Power Automate

highlights.label: Team Leadership & CI/CD
highlights.problem: A financial literacy platform needed a front-end team and development pipeline from scratch
highlights.built: Led 4-person team, built shared component library, set up CI/CD with GitHub Actions
highlights.tech: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, GitHub Actions
highlights.impact: 20% less duplicate code, 30+ successful PR merges, piloted with 100+ students

highlights.label: Enterprise Security
highlights.problem: Web applications serving 1,000+ daily users needed hardened security protocols
highlights.built: CORS policies, proxy configurations, role-based access control, SQL auth
highlights.impact: Zero security incidents during tenure, all deadlines met ahead of schedule

highlights.label: Rapid Prototyping & Hackathons
highlights.problem: 24-hour hackathon — original idea fell apart 4 hours in, needed a fast pivot
highlights.built: Mental health support platform with AI chatbot using OpenAI API
highlights.impact: Top 10 out of 653 participants at nwHacks 2024
